text: 12.40: Ais 6.9-10; Mt 13.15“Fhe Bakɨme mbe rɨmgi ga muuŋgi, mbe bigɨn the gangip, ana kaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Ana vhɨra mbe muuŋgim, mbe pani havhargi. Ana maaŋ mben muuŋgirga, mbe bigɨn the gangip, mbe ndɨkndɨgi mba buna nɨɨŋge kaŋgirga fhu. Maaŋ muuŋgirga, mbe ne kaŋgip, ndavi dorgɨp, taagi na han zɨrim, gu mben muuŋgirim, mbe taagi nzerarga fhu.”
